channel.title: Where could you sell Minecraft accounts?
channel.description:
Well I have two Minecraft accounts and that's obviously 1 to many so I'd like to get rid of it and possibly make a little money why I'm at it. Here's a short explanation of why I have two in the first place, the first being mine that I purchased and the second one is one I gained from a friend who wanted to focus on grades and such so he gave me his account to do with whatever I wanted along with a few things in Runescape aswell.. Basically what exactly I'm asking here, where can I sell my spare account for a decent price of around 5$ or RSGP without needing requirements such as post count or reputation as I'm not active on many other forums and the forum's I am active on don't permit selling of anything due to possible scamming. Any suggestions?
-Note, I would post this in the Mopar Minecraft website but they aren't as active as you are on here and technically this would fit under general questions anyways.

item.title: Where could you sell Minecraft accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

CoonHunter:

Alright I’ll pass this information on to him. Nice skin though

Hahah, alright thanks. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Where could you sell Minecraft accounts?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Sure, the account name is “Ignorant_Sheep” RSGP wise just around 5-8M or so not much.
Sheep was my old account but I like the other account’s name better.
